title: What happened to this game!!?
text: I loved this game and recently I’ve been getting so screwed over. All my balls stop right before going in EVERY ROUND. That never used to happen and it’s constant even tho I’m hitting it correctly. The game is so rigged it’s not even funny. I’ve lost all my coins playing. My screen keeps freezing up every hit I go to take. I got my ball in once and the turn was given to the other player which it shouldn’t have. I’m getting fed up with this. Fix the game.

title: How good 8 ball pool is

title: Good game, too many microtransactions
text: The game is great and has a very active player base. However, I very much dislike the constant popups begging for my money. Even the free daily mini games constantly bombard you with payment options. Being offered "special" cues, etc between matches is also annoying, especially when you go bankrupt. I play this game on the toilet, I don't have time to waste declining all these offers.

title: $$$$ to stay in it.
text: Great game at first but now it’s a scam at every level, but it requires an expenditure of real cash to move up after a certain level, and it’s not cheap to stay in the game, your shots become less accurate after not spending cash to upgrade the many, many enticements offered to players. It gets frustrating after a while, but you have a multitude of cues, upgrades to cues, (I have earned over 100) and options too numerous to list for upgrading your status. The game gets ridiculous after a while and balances out only if you spend a LOT of cash.
